column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Just got back from Chicago for vacation--from New Orleans
column2: so we know good food.  This was the best meal we had on our entire trip.  My husband and I shared 5 tapas
column3: and the bill was $35.  We were stuffed--paella (could pass next time)
column5: goat cheese and tomato sauce (the best!!)
column7: and spicy potatoes.  We recommend this restaurant to all!
